FNL.F.summary: Fresnillo Plc mines, develops, and produces non-ferrous minerals in Mexico. It primarily explores for silver, gold, lead, and zinc concentrates. The company's flagship project is Fresnillo silver mine located in the state of Zacatecas. Fresnillo Plc has mining concessions covering an area of approximately 1.7 million hectares of surface land in Mexico. It also leases mining equipment; produces gold/silver dorÃ© bars; and provides administrative services. The company is headquartered in Mexico City, Mexico. Fresnillo Plc is a subsidiary of Industrias PeÃ±oles S.A.B. de C.V.
